name: houston-we-have-a-bug
description: A Chrome extension for quick bug capture with annotation and context.

scripts.dev: npm run build && concurrently "node build.js --watch" "chokidar 'src/popup.html' 'src/editor.html' 'manifest.json' 'src/images/**' -c 'npm run copy-files'"
scripts.copy-files: cp src/entrypoints/popup.html src/entrypoints/tab.html manifest.json dist/ && cp -r src/images dist/ && cp -r src/fonts dist/ && mkdir -p dist/styles && cp src/styles/fonts.css dist/styles/fonts.css
